recordTypes.name: Signing Up, Creating a Profile & Accessing Your Information
recordTypes.description: Instructions on signing up for a ViewPoint Cloud Account and how to access your profile and records.

recordTypes.name: Receiving Your Permit or Other Document
recordTypes.description: How to view and print your issued permit, license, or other issued document.

recordTypes.name: Blasting and Rock Chipping Permit
recordTypes.description: Per Town Code Chapter 104, Article IV Explosives and Blasting Agents

recordTypes.name: Annual Commuter Parking Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an Annual Commuter Parking Permit for the Hawthorne and Valhalla Metro North stations.

recordTypes.name: Title Search Request
recordTypes.description: This application must be completed by a licensed Title Company.

recordTypes.name: Annual Merchant Parking Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for Annual Merchant Parking Permits for employees of your local business.

recordTypes.name: Request New Sticker (Commuter/Merchant Parking)
recordTypes.description: Request a replacement sticker or change the permitted vehicle.

recordTypes.name: Dog License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a new dog license or renewal.

recordTypes.name: Report Changes to Dog License
recordTypes.description: Request a replacement dog tag or Notify us that you have moved, transferred owners, or your dog has passed away.

recordTypes.name: Filming Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for permission to film in the Town of Mount Pleasant on both Public and Private property.

recordTypes.name: Fireworks Display Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for permission to host a fireworks display.

recordTypes.name: Freedom of Information Request (FOIL)
recordTypes.description: Request a record from the Town of Mount Pleasant.

categories.name: Help, Links, Guides & Other Information
categories.content:
Need help getting started? Please select a topic below. We are also happy to answer any questions you have.

Building Department

categories.name: Town Clerk
categories.content: If you don't see the application you are looking for below, visit the Town Clerk Department page on the Town of Mount Pleasant website.
